settings.subhead: Simple Spectrum is doctor formulated with the highest quality vitamins & minerals:

settings.text: We’ll send you tips and resources as well as sales and promotions!

“This study involved a randomized, controlled, single-blind 12-month treatment study of a comprehensive nutritional and dietary intervention. Participants were 67 children and adults with autism spectrum disorder (ASD) ages 3-58 years from Arizona and 50 nonsibling neurotypical controls of similar age and gender. Treatment began with a special vitamin/mineral supplement, and additional treatments were added sequentially, including essential fatty acids, Epsom salt baths, carnitine, digestive enzymes, and a “Healthy Gluten-free, Casein-free, Soy-free (HGCSF aka GFCFSF) diet. There was a significant improvement in nonverbal intellectual ability in the treatment group compared to the non-treatment group (+6.7 ± 11 IQ points vs. -0.6 ± 11 IQ points, p = 0.009) based on a blinded clinical assessment. Based on semi-blinded assessment, the treatment group, compared to the non-treatment group, had significantly greater improvement in autism symptoms and developmental age. The treatment group had significantly greater increases in EPA, DHA, carnitine, and vitamins A, B2, B5, B6, B12, folic acid, and Coenzyme Q10. The positive results of this study suggest that a comprehensive nutritional and dietary intervention is effective at improving nutritional status, non-verbal IQ, autism symptoms, and other symptoms in most individuals with ASD. Parents reported that the vitamin/mineral supplements, essential fatty acids, and HGCSF diet were the most beneficial."

settings.header: Effect of a vitamin/mineral supplement on children and adults with autism
settings.text: Conclusions: Oral vitamin/mineral supplementation is beneficial in improving the nutritional and metabolic status of children with autism, including improvements in methylation, glutathione, oxidative stress, sulfation, ATP, NADH, and NADPH. The supplement group had significantly greater improvements than did the placebo group on the PGI-R Average Change. This suggests that a vitamin/mineral supplement is a reasonable adjunct therapy to consider for most children and adults with autism.

It’s simple. The highest quality vitamins, minerals and other nutrients in the most bioavailable forms. Designed to fill the nutritional gaps of our picky eaters. Our nutraceutical is designed to provide the nutritional needs of the developing nervous system with extra support for individuals with autism by addressing potential dietary deficits.

settings.header: how quickly could one see a difference?
settings.text: We recommend taking for 3 months for optimal results but a person with a true nutrient deficit might see a difference even sooner.
Yes. We love our international customers!

settings.header: does this supplement come in a capsule/pill?
settings.text: Due to the fact that many children on the spectrum have sensory issues and/or trouble swallowing, we designed our Simple Spectrum Supplement to be in a powder form so it can be easily mixed in water or your child’s favorite drink. It can even be added to a soft serve food like yogurt, pudding, or purees.

settings.header: how does simple spectrum supplement taste?
settings.text: We formulated our Simple Spectrum Supplement to be unflavored and easily mixed in water or your child’s favorite drink. Due to the nature of ingredients, it may have a slight “vitamin” taste, but the mild taste is easily masked by juice or diluted in water. You can even mix it in a smoothie, yogurt, or similar food as well.

settings.header: how many servings are in each bottle?
settings.text: Simple Spectrum Supplement has 30 servings based on a 60-90lb child. If your child weighs less than 60lbs, it will have more servings: if your child is more than 90lbs, it will have less. Please see dosage chart for more information

settings.header: how long does one bottle last?
settings.text: Usually one to two months depending on your child's weight.

settings.header: the cap on the bottle isn’t secured tightly. should i be concerned?
settings.text: Not at all. As long as the clear plastic seal around the outside bottle cap is on, that’s all that matters. The reason our caps aren’t tightened is because we don’t use any glue or chemicals to seal our bottles. Your child’s health and safety is and always will be our #1 priority.

settings.header: how do i know if the supplement has expired or should be discarded?
settings.text: All of our supplement containers have the manufactured date listed on them. Our supplement is effective and safe to use for up to two years after the manufactured date.

settings.header: can teenagers use take this product
settings.text: Yes! Anyone can take this product. Dosage is based on weight.

Absolutely! It’s designed for those with nutrient deficits based on scientific research. If you don’t suspect any deficits we suggest giving them the dosage right under their weight. For example - if they are between 60-90lb dose we would say give them the 30-60lb dose. If you have any further questions or concerns please speak with your pediatrician.

settings.header: can my child with adhd take this product?
settings.text: Yes. If you have concerns, please consult with your pediatrician.

settings.header: Why is your supplement more expensive than my child's typical gummy vitamin?
settings.text: This is a nutraceutical you would typically find in a physician’s office for $100 or more. These are pure vitamins and minerals in the best forms with no additives.
Our product is formulated right here in the United States.
On this website, Amazon.com and clinicians / MAPs doctors (Medical Association Of Pediatrics Special Needs) throughout the world.

settings.text: No.

settings.header: is this vitamin gluten and casein free?
settings.text: Yes, it is free from gluten, casein, soy, GMO’s, milk and milk derivatives, added sugar, artificial colors and flavors, and preservatives. In other words, just the good stuff!
No. In fact it is a nutraceutical free of gluten, casein, added sugar, soy, soy, binding agents, artificial colors, preservatives, GMOS and dairy, Only pure vitamins and minerals in the best forms!
Yes

settings.header: does this product contain a prebiotic?
settings.text: Yes! Larch Arabinogalactan helps to increase the number of desirable bacteria in our digestive systems to support a healthy gut!

settings.header: Do you third party test and what does that mean?
settings.text: Yes! We test every batch to ensure what we say is in your vitamin is actually in your vitamin.

settings.header: what is cardboard piece in my bottle?
settings.text: Simple Spectrum is free of gluten, casein, added sugar, soy, binding agents, artificial colors, preservatives, GMOs and dairy. Since we don’t add preservatives this piece helps keep your product fresh. Please keep it in your bottle.

settings.header: is it normal to have bright orange urine?
settings.text: Important B vitamins in our supplement contain yellow-orange pigments and may give off a mild vitamin smell or taste. These pigments when passed through the body may color the urine.

settings.header: can you use this supplement with a multivitamin or other supplements?
settings.text: We really consider our supplement an all in one, including prebiotic, and don't suggest adding much! If you have any further questions or concerns, we always recommend speaking with your doctor that knows you best.

settings.header: i'm ordering internationally and/or using currency that isn't US Dollars. How can I estimate the total amount I will end up paying in my currency?
settings.text: The best way to know your currency conversion rate, currency conversion fees, international purchase fees, etc., is to contact your bank, credit card provider or alternate financial institution you'll be using to make your purchase. Since these fees can vary greatly depending on many factors, we aren't able to estimate this on our site for you. Sorry for the inconvenience!
